title: February 2024 livestreams
html_content:
These are livestreams filmed by Chris in February 2024, influenced by Praetor.

Contents

    • 1.2 Highlights
    • 1.3 Raw captions
  • 2 Round 2 - Media Share Suggestion Live Stream
    • 2.1 Description
    • 2.2 Highlights

  • 3 Christ Chan Live Stream: Legos, Games and Media
    • 3.1 Part 1
      • 3.1.1 Description
      • 3.1.2 Transcript
    • 3.2 Part 2
      • 3.2.1 Description
      • 3.2.2 Highlights

Very First Media Share Suggestion Live Stream

"I support Israel! Palestine[...] they have more... demons and devils within them"

Chris intended for this stream to allow viewers to share various media clips with him. However, he was plagued with technical issues ranging from being unable to play the clips, to having the audio cut out on him, and after failing to get it to work for about 15 minutes, he gave up and switched to the regular Q&A format. About halfway through the stream he was finally able to get the clips to work, although the audio only played for him, not the viewers.

Round 2 - Media Share Suggestion Live Stream

Description

Support the stream: [links to Streamlabs]

Highlights

Highlights
  • 02:12: [Stream begins]
  • 21:58 Chris stands up to take down the canvas behind him.
  • 26:44: Chris unleashes a behemoth burp. Chris: "Mhm, pardon me."
  • 28:09: Chris: "Oh, I actually- you know what, I answer the que- I will answer this one question that's not a Superchat, but I just saw it in the side-stream here, but- yeah. [Dramatic pause] I SUPPORT ISRAEL! Palestine's there... or they have more... demons and devils within them- they have lots more doubt within them as opposed to Israel. So... there you go. [Snaps fingers and sings an aria] [Claps hands]
  • 28:23: User "Jenny Reads" donates and says: "you hurt snorlax. how do you sleep at night?". Chris: "I don't know what you're talking about, all my Snorlaxes have been kept in their Pokeballs within the Pokemon home-storage... and within my games and whatsoever- at least the... ALL the numbers of boxes I have... on the C-197 half of the Earth." [Trademark Hm]
  • 29:10: User "Azearia" donates and says: "do your dimensional powers change your hair color". Chris: "In a way... yes. Yes, they do."
  • 35:28: User "Moosequester" donates and says: "Christine what do you have to say about the Israel Defence Force blowing up a few of the oldest Christian churches in Israel?". Chris: "Hm, yeah... okay, that's not... great."
  • 38:06: User "tealichu" donates and says: "chris do you have a discord that True and Good hearted fans can join :33". Chris: "Um, we're gonna- that's- uhh... not at the present moment, but we may end up bringing that back up as soon as possible."
  • 38:20 Chris brings his hands to his temple, clearly distressed about something. Chris: "I- I'M GOING TO SAY THIS RIGHT NOW, SO... I... have a Discord... I still do, but... I don't use it as much. There, I said it."
  • 39:52 Chris changes his background and rants whilst muted until switching back to his original background and regaining sound at 40:38.
  • 41:03 Chris adds the widget to his stream to show his media submissions. It cannot be heard by the audience.
  • 41:40 Chris and his audience learn that his very first media submission is the first episode of Ongezellig, which opens with the lead character getting caught watching soft-core hentai.
  • 42:00 The second video shared with Chris via media share is a "Skibidi Toilet" meme with a spinning Black Sun symbol used by neo-Nazis. Chris is aware of Skibidi Toilet, but not the symbol.
  • 42:14 Chris changes scenes and is once again muted for 5 seconds till he changes back.
  • 44:06 Chris drinks a can of regular Coke with one pinky raised, eyes closed and loud, powerful slurps.
  • 46:43 User "TedKaczynski" donates saying: "Hey CWC! Hugh fan!!!!! Can you shout out my bestest friend ever Nick Gerlips?". Chris very nearly falls for it, saying the first name and stopping just in time.
  • 57:45 User "TwentyRex" donates saying: "Christine!! what conventions do you think you will be going to this year?" Chris: "I told you, I'm taking a break from conventions. I will not be going to any more conventions for a long long long time. Period.... Anyway..."
  • 58:07 User "BrassBus" donates saying: "Jesus. I need your help. Please. Can you tell me who will win the SuperBowl. The Chiefs or the 49ers? I bet my life savings. I need this. Please Lord. SmokeyMcC wont help me at all." Chris proceeds to tell them to put their money on the Miners.
  • 1:04:28 Chris says that the Israel Palestine conflict will affect the dimensional merge.
  • 1:04:37 Chris sings: "One way or another, I'm gonna' find ya... and you will not take any pictures, CAUSE I'LL" [Imitates smashing someone's camera]
  • 1:12:55 Stream ends.

Christ Chan Return Live Stream Highlights

Description

Support the stream: [links to Streamlabs]

Highlights

3:25: Chris talks about trying to fix his sleep schedule, saying he would like to be able to wake up at an earlier time. He says he needs to readjust to how it was while he was in Gateway Homes.

4:20: Chris shares a passage from the Goddess Log pages, recounting his first time surviving COVID-19 in jail over the span of nine days.

6:25: Chris talks about how cold it got while he was in jail.

10:20: Chris's says his favorite song from Hazbin Hotel is "Loser, Baby".

12:22: After a while, Chris volunteered to get the kosher trays while in jail.

13:21: Chris gets asked if he is on good terms with Barb. Chris says "My mother and I..." but is interrupted by strange sounds coming from a different room causing Chris to give a weird stare. Chris then says "Ignore that."

20:20: A YouTube video titled Rakin' the Lawn (spoofing the Judas Priest song "Breaking the Law") plays.

21:18: Chris declares, "My poop has become green."

23:01: Chris mentions that someone else from jail taught him a "fifteen-second expanding breathing technique." Chris does not mention his name.

23:50: Chris says he would not give someone a titjob for money.

23:53: A YouTube video titled You are a fool Jacinto (a clip from the movie Cured of Fears) plays.

25:33: Chris burps.

27:16: Chris shows his muscles, or the lack thereof.

28:42: Chris makes an Adventure Time reference and sings the show's intro.

29:50: A YouTube upload of "Color Your Night -Full-", from the Persona 3 Reload soundtrack, plays. Chris dances to the music.

31:50: Episode 1 of Epithet Erased, "Quiet in the Museum!", plays. Chris also says that ProjectSNT hasn't really blocked him, "I'm still watching."

32:07: The Rakin' the Lawn video plays again.

33:28: Chris pulls his shirt up to his head a la Cornholio.

34:27: Chris changes the stream overlay to show his Nintendo Switch screen.

34:41: Chris does a Captain's Log.

34:58: Chris puts in the game cartridge for The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+ into his Nintendo Switch and begins to play.

35:16: Rakin' the Lawn plays again.

37:00: A donator says their friend met Chris at a Mission BBQ once. Chris says it's possible because he went to Mission BBQ a few times while at Gateway Homes.

38:28: A donator tells Chris that they will donate $50 if Chris wins a game of Tetris 99 on stream. Chris closes The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+ and opens Tetris 99.

40:37: Rakin' the Lawn plays yet again.

40:54: A YouTube video titled Better than Any Paradox Game | Hearts of Iron III plays.

42:53: Chris loses the Tetris 99 game. Chris also does a verbal shoutout after the donator says they will donate $100 for him to do so.

44:27: A YouTube upload of episode 2 of The Handymen, "The Job", plays.

46:53: Chris claims ProjectSNT will change her mind shortly enough. It is foreknown.

48:15: Chris talks about his old radio show.

49:39: Chris loses another Tetris 99 game.

50:02: A YouTube upload of HHgregg's "Christmas in July" commercial plays.

50:31: An "Uncensored Trailer" of The Handymen plays.

50:46: Chris says that pride is not a sin, but rather arrogance.

51:53: A YouTube upload of "Vultures of North" by Orbit Culture plays. Chris says heavy metal is his least favorite music genre, but he still tolerates it.

54:10: A YouTube video titled [YTPMV] - hhgregg Chipi Chipi Chapa Chapa in July plays.

55:56: Chris talks about reading the r/ChrisChanSonichu subreddit.

57:10: Chris loses the Tetris 99 game.

57:21: Chris sings "I Got A Fish."

59:44: Chris says he is not into anything NSFW anymore.

1:01:17: A YouTube video titled Chris Chan is the impostor plays.

1:01:54: Chris has come to terms with Megan leaving his life.

1:02:36: Chris loses the Tetris 99 game, losing every game he played.

1:02:50: Chris closes Tetris 99 and opens The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+.

1:03:15: Chris burps again.

1:04:48: A YouTube upload of "Wargblod (Bonus Track)" by Orbit Culture plays.

1:05:36: Chris has not heard of PokeMMO.

1:06:00: A ween plays a video of My Little Pony: Make Your Mark, which Chris flips out over, covering his ears and chanting "Lalala".

1:06:45: A YouTube video titled FAT OLD VR CHAT PREACHER GONE INSANE!! COMPILATION plays.

1:07:54: "Wargblod (Bonus Track)" plays again.

1:08:11: An upload of Chris Comes Out of the Closet plays. Chris responds "I know... I used to be homophobic way back when, but now I'm not."

1:11:36: Chris says he has watched Smiling Friends and recites the line he was originally planned to do.

1:11:51: Chris is tired of the Fanta meme.

1:12:57: A YouTube upload of "Obsession" by Orbit Culture plays. Chris says that the band is not righteous.

1:13:14: A YouTube video titled Spike, The Dragon Lord! My Little Pony: Make Your Mark Netflix After School plays. Chris freaks out and then complains that the filter for the media share videos could be better.

1:13:35: A YouTube video titled Math. Math! plays.

1:13:45: Chris Comes Out of the Closet plays again.

1:19:00: A YouTube video titled "Izzy Does It" FULL EPISODE NEW My Little Pony: Make Your Mark Series Netflix After School plays. Chris freaks out.

1:20:20: Chris takes a bathroom break.

1:25:24: Chris returns from his bathroom break.

1:25:51: A YouTube video titled "Izzy Does It" FULL EPISODE NEW My Little Pony: Make Your Mark Series Netflix After School plays again. Chris promptly freaks out.

1:26:39: A YouTube video titled "Chris Chan - Virgin With Rage" (which is a clip of Chris singing "So Need a Cute Girl", from The Contest NEVER was to Determine Who was Who) plays.

1:28:33: Chris says he does not eat McDonald's every day.

1:32:31: A YouTube video titled Orbit Culture - Obsession plays again.

1:35:37: A YouTube video titled My Little Pony - Friendship is Gic: What a Story Mark Crusaders plays.

1:37:51: Chris says Sonichu and Mega Man would be friends.

1:39:04: Chris's favorite Yu-Gi-Oh! cards are Dark Magician and Dark Magician Girl.

1:41:03: A YouTube upload of THAT IS MY HOUSE, featuring Robert Chandler, plays.

1:46:57: A YouTube upload of the infamous shock animation Pinkie Pie Smile HD plays, causing Chris to freak out because of the video's graphic and violent nature.

1:49:33: Chris mentions that Haruka Tenoh is also one of his favorite Sailor Moon characters.

1:57:11: A YouTube video titled Exterminatus plays.

1:57:21: Chris closes The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+.
